information: The company HEROLDER FÖRDERTECHNIK GMBH, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1989, which operates in the Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment industry. It also operates in the Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, Building materials, manufacture - machinery and equipment, Construction site installations and equipment, and Road, beach and ski-slope maintenance - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Thum-Herold, Germany.
